name: Right Now
content: And we can't get back yesterday
'Cause all we got is right now
因为我们拥有的只有此时此刻
And we can't get back yesterday
'Cause all we got is right now now
因为我们拥有的只有此时此刻
And I feel it when I see you
当我看到你我就感觉到了
无论何时宝贝我属于你
And we can't get back yesterday
'Cause all we got is right now
因为我们拥有的只有此时此刻
And we can't get back yesterday
'Cause all we got is right now now
因为我们拥有的只有此时此刻
'Cause all we got is right now now
因为我们拥有的只有此时此刻
So close I can taste you you
近在咫尺我能感受到你的气息
Ain't scared I can take you
一件你想做一辈子的事
别再等待今夜就要到来
如果感觉如此美好那就不会错
And we can't get back yesterday
'Cause all we got is right now
因为我们拥有的只有此时此刻

'Cause all we got is right now now
